Package dt.model

Class ServerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • dt.model.Board
      • dt.model.ServerBoard
  • public class ServerBoard
extends Board
    Author:
    Emiel Rous and Wouter Koning The extensions of the Board class, which only the server uses. This class is capable of board creation.

    • Method Detail

      • setupBoard

        public void setupBoard()

      • createBoard

        public int[] createBoard()
        The method to be called when you want to create a new board.
        Returns:
        A valid board in the shape of int.
        ensures
        The board created will hold to the rules that there are 6 balls of which each 8 colours, none of which lie next to to each other.

      • createBallTypeBoard

        public BallType[] createBallTypeBoard()
        A method which creates a board using the Enum BallType. This is first done by iteratively placing balls on the board, which places a ball that is not in conflict with one of its current neighbours. At some point, it can happen that there is no more valid balls to place, after which it tries to switch all the balls that did fit on the board with balls at another location as best it can.

        It is recommended to run the method fixNeighbouringBalls(BallType[]) after this, to make sure that the board creation is done proper and well.

        Returns:
        A representation of a board which is nearly correct.

      • isSwapable

        public boolean isSwapable​(BallType[] board,
                          int index,
                          BallType ball)
        Finds out whether a ball can put put on that position by checking whether the parameter ball matches with any of its neighbours.
        Parameters:
        board - The array in which the swapping will be happening
        index - The index of the element which is being checked for whether it can be swapped
        ball - The BallType which would like to be swapped.
        Returns:
        whether the parameter ball is suitable at index.

      • swap

        public void swap​(BallType[] array,
                 int b1,
                 int b2)
        Swap two elements in an array of BallType.
        Parameters:
        array - The array which has the swapping going on.
        b1 - Index 1 of the swapping
        b2 - Index 2 of the swapping.
        ensures
        That the elements at the two indexes are now swapped, and nothing else has changed.
